channel.title: Somebody PLEASE HELP ME! With my 517 server, making myself owner
channel.description: PLEASE! can someone help me! ive tried making myself owner 100 times.. and it wont work, i change my char rights to 2, or 3.. and it resets my acc and im not owner/admin, and then when i look again my rights are back down to 0, ive changed all of the p.rights to my name, and yet i still cant get myself to be owner, someone please help!

item.title: Somebody PLEASE HELP ME! With my 517 server, making myself owner
item.dc:creator: @Moonbounddowntoearth Moonbounddowntoearth
item.description:
@Moonbounddowntoearth wrote:

RS2LoginProtocol Instead of login.java youll have to paste the
if (p.username.equals(“Bonjour”)) {
p.rights = 2;
in under the code
Engine.fileManager.loadCharacter§;
if (password != null && p.password != null && p.password != “” && !p.password.equals(password)) {
returnCode = 3;
} else {
p.password = password;
}

item.title: Somebody PLEASE HELP ME! With my 517 server, making myself owner
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

search for login.java and if it doesn’t come up then search for
if (p.username.equals(
then once you find that you want to add this if you got caps in your name

if (p.username.equals("UserName") || p.username.equals("username")) { p.rights = 2; }
in the first quotes, make sure you use the exact username with caps. Then in the second Quotes, put your username in lowercase. Save, compile, run…done…

Basically here’s an example with your username…

	if (p.username.equals("Bonjour") || p.username.equals("bonjour")) {
        	p.rights = 2;
	}

EDIT: add me on msn, kickyamom@gmail.com , i’m sure this is confusing, it works for me though

Read full topic

find the file named “login.java” and look for some coding like this

if (p.username.equals("")) {
p.rights = 2;[/quote]I know thats what i should be doing, but everytime i type it in on the search, there’s not Login file at all, ive even gone through every file myself looking and there is no file… i’m really stumped and need some help o.o

item.title: Somebody PLEASE HELP ME! With my 517 server, making myself owner
item.dc:creator: @warouxriot warouxriot
item.description:
@warouxriot wrote:

Dude,
find the file named “login.java” and look for some coding like this

if (p.username.equals("")) {
p.rights = 2;
}
if (p.username.equals("")) {
p.rights = 2;
}
if (p.username.equals("")) {
p.rights = 2;
}
if (p.username.equals("")) {
p.rights = 2;
}
if (p.username.equals("")) {
p.rights = 2;
}

Then simply add your name inbetween the “” so it would be like this

}
if (p.username.equals(“Bonjour”)) {
p.rights = 2;

Or whatever your ingame name is
